values: C.S. Lewis, Romantic Rationalist: How His Paths to Christ Shaped His Life and MinistryC.S. Lewis, Romantic Rationalist: How His Paths to Christ Shaped His Life and Ministry

Lewis’s romanticism and rationalism were the paths on which he came to Christ — and the paths on which he lived his life and did his work.Lewis’s romanticism and rationalism were the paths on which he came to Christ — and the paths on which he lived his life and did his work.
